description:
The magic power of the Ritual swirling around Edo attracts many oddities.
Tsujigiri of tremendous skill. A mysterious deadly blade.

Miyamoto Iori and Saber, who are investigating the situation at the behest of Sukenoshin, are confronted by a swordsman of a much higher skill. A Servant.
Is this the rumored Tsujigiri? 
Just as they wonder, the Servant suddenly lowers his sword to introduce himself.

“...I am Yagyu Munenori.
A figment of human history, and now a swordsman with no master.”

A newly arrived Rogue Saber, a master of swordsmanship, whose True Name is Yagyu Tajima-no-Kami Munenori.
What is his purpose here? And what is his connection to Tsujigiri? 
Accompanied by a new Servant, Iori and Saber traverse the blood-soaked streets of Edo.

- How to Play
In order to play the “Record's Fragment: Yagyu Sword Chronicles” DLC, you need to play the base game until reaching “My Mind Bides on the Battlefield” (Chapter 3).
Once you are able to move freely on the Edo Map, please select “Record's Fragment: Yagyu Sword Chronicles” on the map to begin playing.

Note:
This item is included in the Season Pass. Please avoid making redundant purchases.
name: Additional Episode 2 "Record's Fragment: Yagyu Sword Chronicles"
